actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for, and clarify the classification of, machines and components used in the manufacture of digital versatile discs (DVDs).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to certain machines and components used in the manufacture of digital versatile discs (DVDs). Sets forth provisions clarifying the classification of such articles for tariff treatment purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for, and clarify the classification of, machines and components used in the manufacture of digital versatile discs (DVDs).
